staticherobanner.description: Take our natural gas service with you. Our natural gas service plans are designed to serve your needs.
staticherobanner.title: Moving?

moving_content.confirmationpageheader: Thank you for considering Grand Rapids Energy.
moving_content.confirmationpagesubhead: Your information has been submitted successfully!
moving_content.header:
Moving can be stressful. That is why we make it easy to sign up for natural gas service with Grand Rapids Energy.

Before you move into your new residence, call your local Gas Utility to establish Before you move into your new residence, call your local gas utility to establish your natural gas service. If you’re not sure who supplies the natural gas service for your new address, ask your realtor, apartment manager or previous owners.
moving_content.sidecontent:
In Ohio, the choices are:
  • DTE Gas Company
  • Consumers Energy

Once you have your Gas Utility account number, you can sign up online with Grand Rapids Energy to lock in a fixed rate.

Natural gas consumers in the state of Michigan may choose their natural Gas Utility under the state's customer choice program.

WHAT IS ENERGY CHOICE?

In Michigan, it means you have the power to choose your natural gas supplier, which means you could get a lower rate!

Just as you shop for the products and services, you may also be able to shop for natural gas service. Energy customers from large manufacturers diverse group of competetive supliers certified by the Michigan Public Services Comission(MPSC). As more supliers are offering their services in your area, you can choose the natural gas service company that gives you the best rates and natural gas service.

Compare rates with Grand Rapids Energy and go with the lowest to save on your natural gas bill!

For information on the status of natural gas competition in Michigan, visit the Michigan Public Services Comission(MPSC)
moving_content.specialoffer: Yes, Grand Rapids Energy may send me information about special offers from Grand Rapids Energy and its marketing partners.
